Title: Prohibits possession of a gun or non-folding knife at a governmental chamber or public hearing of the state or any political subdivision
Summary: Prohibits the possession of a gun or non-folding knife while upon the premises of a governmental chamber or at a public hearing of the state or any political subdivision thereof; such violation shall constitute a class E felony; exempts police officers and security personnel.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to prohibited use of weapons
